entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
